thread.title: This Hedgehog Cafe In Tokyo Is The Cutest Thing You'll See All Day

author: Jun Tsuboike, Izzy Francke
title: This Hedgehog Cafe In Tokyo Is The Cutest Thing You'll See All Day
text:
Hi buddy. ID: 10462355 2. People can feed the hedgehogs while there… View this image ›
Look at that lil face!
ID: 10462416 3. …or just share a sweet cuddle with one of the little hedgies. View this image ›
D’a .
ID: 10462423 4. Harry Cafe prioritizes the health and safety of the hedgehogs and makes sure to have visitors disinfect their hands before playing with them. It also has people follow certain rules during their visit. View this image ›
ID: 10462478 5. Whether you’re an animal lover or not, it’s pretty hard to deny how cute these guys are: View this image ›
ID: 10462451 6. Watch the full video here: Facebook: video.php ID: 10462658 So, would you visit this Hedgehog Cafe if you could? Omfg YES! I want to cuddle one right now!
